headline: Forescout Named Keysight Network Visibility Tech Partner of the Year
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., January 14, 2026--Forescout Technologies, a global leader in cybersecurity, today announced it has been named Keysight Technologies, Inc.’s (NYSE: KEYS) Network Visibility Tech Partner of the Year. Keysight’s Network Visibility business unit honored Forescout with this inaugural award, recognizing the strength of a partnership that delivers enhanced visibility, reduces cyber risk, and streamlines operations across IT, OT, IoT, and IoMT environments.
